00008 /*
00009  * Definition of static object.
00010  *
00011  * A stat record is basically just a reference to a nif file. Some
00012  * esps seem to contain copies of the STAT entries from the esms, and
00013  * the esms themselves contain several identical entries. Perhaps all
00014  * statics referenced in a file is also put in the file? Since we are
00015  * only reading files it doesn't much matter to us, but it would if we
00016  * were writing our own ESM/ESPs. You can check some files later when
00017  * you decode the CELL blocks, if you want to test this hypothesis.
00018  */
00019

00021 {
00022   std::string model;
00023 
00024   void load(ESMReader &esm);
00025 };
00026 }
